summary: Implements a HiFi‑GAN based neural vocoder within the NeMo framework, handling model construction, data loading, training loops with adversarial and feature‑matching losses, validation, inference to convert mel‑spectrograms into high‑fidelity audio waveforms, as well as checkpointing, learning‑rate scheduling, logging, and model export capabilities.
business_intent: Enables developers to integrate high‑quality speech synthesis into text‑to‑speech applications, providing a ready‑to‑use vocoder that improves voice realism and supports deployment in commercial TTS products.
